scene.sd: Jeong Jeong grabs a falling leaf and burns the center.
scene.sp: Jeong JeongConcentrate on the fire. I want you to keep the flame from reaching the edges of the leaf for as long as you can.
AangAnnoyed. This is the worst firebending instruction ever! All he does is leave me for hours to concentrate or breathe!
KataraI'm sure there's a good reason.
AangBut I'm ready to do so much more.
scene.sd: Aang remembers to concentrate on his leaf and gets into a stance and breaths. Moments later, the leaf burns up creating a small flame.
scene.sp: AangExcited. I did it! I made fire!
KataraAang, that's great, but you should take it slow.
scene.sd: Aang starts playing with it by tossing it back and forth from in front to behind himself. He makes a blast go in the opposite direction.
scene.sp: AangI wonder how that juggler did it.
scene.sd: Aang tosses it into the air and spreads his arms out. For a second, he has a smile on his face, but it vanishes as he accidentally burns Katara's hands. Katara shrieks in pain.
Sokka comes running to Katara's side.
scene.sp: SokkaConcerned. Katara, what's wrong? Angrily. What did you do?!
AangIt was an accident! I was, uh... Katara, I'm so--
SokkaI told you we shouldn't mess around with this! Look what you did! You burned my sister! Katara runs away. You burned my sister! As Jeong Jeong walks in. This is all your fault!
Jeong JeongI know! Now pack your things. You must leave immediately.
AangI'm sorry, I didn't ... Sokka runs off. I'm sorry! Jeong Jeong looks at Aang, displeased.
